channel.title: [PI]Multi Combat Areas Help
channel.description:
I'm using NICKname's client and server, and I cant seem to make Bandos a multi combat area. Am i doing it wrong or something?
Here's the code in Npc.java, I compile with no errors, but when i test it, i can still only be attacked by 1 npc. [code] (absX >= 2876 && absX <= 2864 && absY >= 5351 && absY <= 5369 && heightLevel == 2)) {[/code]
Help is appreciated, Thanks.

item.title: [PI]Multi Combat Areas Help
item.dc:creator: @Joshers Joshers
item.description:
@Joshers wrote:

I’m using NICKname’s client and server, and I cant seem to make Bandos a multi combat area.
Am i doing it wrong or something?

Here’s the code in Npc.java, I compile with no errors, but when i test it, i can still only be attacked by 1 npc.

			(absX >= 2876 && absX <= 2864 && absY >= 5351 && absY <= 5369 && heightLevel == 2)) {

Help is appreciated, Thanks.
